author: Ursula Perano
title: Date from home: Romance in the age of the coronavirus
description: Widespread social distancing has forced Americans to get creative with how they connect to one another, including romantically. The big picture: The dating industry was poised to take a hit amid the coronavirus outbreak as potential suitors are generally unab…
content:
